full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-AJN Document 97-3 Filed 12/14/20 Page 2 of 5 30th November 2020 The Honorable Alison J. Nathan United States District Court Southern District of New York United States Courthouse 40 Foley Square New York, NY 10007 Dear Judge Nathan: I have known Ghislaine all her life. Ghislaine and I have always enjoyed sharing the personal experience of our lives with each other. she was full of 'vim and vigor' and always just lovely to be with. she and I have seen our relationship strengthen through shared common interests. In particular, Ghislaine's passion for making a positive difference in the world, notably through her creation of the non-profit TerraMar Project focusing on the protection of the world's oceans, gave me and met up much more consistently over the past seven years It is a joy to be one of her best friends. 1 | P a g e DOJ-OGR-00002028

text_blocks.content: The Honorable Alison J. Nathan United States District Court Southern District of New York United States Courthouse 40 Foley Square New York, NY 10007

I have known Ghislaine all her life. Ghislaine and I have always enjoyed sharing the personal experience of our lives with each other. she was full of 'vim and vigor' and always just lovely to be with. she and I have seen our relationship strengthen through shared common interests. In particular, Ghislaine's passion for making a positive difference in the world, notably through her creation of the non-profit TerraMar Project focusing on the protection of the world's oceans, gave me and met up much more consistently over the past seven years It is a joy to be one of her best friends.

additional_notes: The document appears to be a letter of support for Ghislaine, likely in a legal context given the case number and court details. The text has been partially redacted.
